trans-unit.source: Arrow annotations can be used to connect to points on the chart or to highlight a single chart area.
trans-unit.target: Pil merknader kan brukes til å koble til punkt på diagrammet eller til å utheve et enkelt diagramområde.

trans-unit.source: Different arrow styles and sizes can be applied to the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Annen Pilstiler og størrelser kan brukes i en merknad.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ArrowAnnotation"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ArrowAnnotation"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position alignment of the annotation to the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir justeringen for plasseringen av merknaden til ankerpunktet.

trans-unit.source: The annotation must be anchored using either <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Merknaden må være forankret ved hjelp av <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A> properties must be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> enumeration value that represents the alignment of the annotation to the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som representerer justeringen for merknaden fra ankerpunktet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the annotation type.
For internal use, should not be used.
trans-unit.target: For intern bruk, kan ikke brukes.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of each annotation type such as Line, Rectangle, Ellipse, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på hver for merknadstypen som linje, rektangel, ellipsen og så videre.

trans-unit.source: This property is for internal use and is hidden at design time and run time.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er gjelder internt hos skjult på utformingstidspunktet og kjøretid.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the annotation type.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer navnet på merknadstypen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an arrow size, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en pilstørrelse i piksler.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents arrow size—that is, its thickness—in pixels.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer pilstørrelse – det vil si tykkelse, i piksler.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the arrow style.
